I can't reproduce this issue but I can see how it could happen.  Can you provide a plug-in as an attachment that reproduces this so I can confirm?

svn co http://www.sebastian.davids.name/svn/examples/name.davids.sebastian.example.rcp.minimal/trunk/ name.davids.sebastian.example.rcp.minimal

I'm getting a 404 on that file.  As a general rule I can't look at things that aren't in bugzilla anyway for legal reasons.  Would you be able to attach a simple testcase to the bug?
Aha, so you're tearing down the splash eagerly...  mmm I'll need to consider this case.

I've updated the patch to not post updates if the splash is already gone.  I also unregister the StartupMonitor hook once it's been executed successfully so it wont get called again when we call Platform.endSplash().
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
